thread.title: 'Beauty & The Beast' Debuts Final Trailer Featuring Ariana Grande & John Legend Duet - Watch Now!
thread.title_full: 'Beauty & The Beast' Debuts Final Trailer Featuring Ariana Grande & John Legend Duet - Watch Now!

author: Just Jared
title: 'Beauty & The Beast' Debuts Final Trailer Featuring Ariana Grande & John Legend Duet - Watch Now!
text:
Beauty and the Beast just debuted a brand new trailer and it’s absolutely stunning. 
The two and half minute trailer not only features tons of new footage but it also gives a sneak peek at Ariana Grande and John Legend ‘s “Beauty and the Beast” duet .
In the final trailer for the highly anticipated film, fans get a look at Emma Watson ‘s Belle as she winds up at the Beast’s castle and cares for him as they fall in love. 
Beauty and the Beast is set to hit theaters on March 17.
Check out the brand new trailer below…
